<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#af61b31a99c1e58b1760492d2a7a1ba9c">llvm::MemoryLocation::getOrNone</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;llvm::Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Val));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns the gap between the memory locations accessed by \\p I0 and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p I1 in bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoadOrStoreT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a52c21a2bc9e5238472dabfd4183158e5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;int&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a52c21a2bc9e5238472dabfd4183158e5">getPointerDiffInBytes</a>(LoadOrStoreT &#42;I0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  LoadOrStoreT &#42;I1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(std::is&#95;same&#95;v&lt;LoadOrStoreT, LoadInst&gt; ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      std::is&#95;same&#95;v&lt;LoadOrStoreT, StoreInst&gt;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected sandboxir::Load or sandboxir::Store!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Opnd0 = I0-&gt;getPointerOperand()-&gt;Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Opnd1 = I1-&gt;getPointerOperand()-&gt;Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Ptr0 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(Opnd0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Ptr1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(Opnd1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Ptr0 != Ptr1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">llvm::Type</a> &#42;ElemTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7ba5de75f50bb4a4ba920698edf39b28">llvm::Type::getInt8Ty</a>(SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#aff9e533399d91febd63fa4bfe82a42a7">getContext</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a034d66b8c0aeb72ea13fd26392083446">getPointersDiff</a>(ElemTy, Opnd0, ElemTy, Opnd1, I0-&gt;getDataLayout(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           SE, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;StrictCheck=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;CheckType=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\Returns true if \\p I0 accesses a memory location lower than \\p I1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns false if the difference cannot be determined, if the memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// locations are equal, or if I1 accesses a memory location greater than I0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoadOrStoreT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a283da28f49cf79afe0661c5b84db7910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a283da28f49cf79afe0661c5b84db7910">atLowerAddress</a>(LoadOrStoreT &#42;I0, LoadOrStoreT &#42;I1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Diff = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/utils/#a52c21a2bc9e5238472dabfd4183158e5">getPointerDiffInBytes</a>(I0, I1, SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Diff)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Diff &gt; 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
